title: Exploring JavaScript Logical OR Operator
description: In this lab, we will explore the logical or (||) operator in JavaScript. The purpose of this lab is to understand how the logical or operator works and how it can be used to check if at least one of the given arguments is true. Through practical examples, we will learn how to implement the logical or operator in our code.

meta.title: JavaScript Logical OR Operator | Coding Practice
meta.description: Explore the logical or operator in JavaScript and learn how to implement it in your code through practical examples.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Logical OR Operator, Coding Practice, Programming Tutorials, Web Development

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 探索 JavaScript 逻辑或运算符
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索 JavaScript 中的逻辑或 (||) 运算符。本实验的目的是了解逻辑或运算符的工作原理，以及如何使用它来检查给定参数中是否至少有一个为 true。通过实际示例，我们将学习如何在代码中实现逻辑或运算符。

meta.title: JavaScript 逻辑或运算符 | 编码练习
meta.description: 探索 JavaScript 中的逻辑或运算符，并通过实际示例学习如何在代码中实现它。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 逻辑或运算符, 编码练习, 编程教程, 网页开发

verify.name: 验证 Node 命令的用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH 中输入 'node' 并回车即可运行 JavaScript。
